bath hardware & accessories

Paper Holders for the Bath

The Pegasus decorative paper holders feature solid construction with European design. Each finish is beautifully presented with easy to install craftmanship. Matching bath faucets are available.

Attainable Luxury

Available finishes are Brushed Nickel, Chrome and other decorative combinations. Add matching bath faucets to compliment your décor.
